name: Future Blues DVD
summary:
内容（「キネマ旬報社」データベースより）
『COWBOY BEBOP』の楽曲を手掛けたSEAT BELTSの映像作品。さまざまなアーティストのビジュアルワークを手掛ける永石勝が創り出したショートムービーと、ライブから「BAD DOG NO BISCUITS」「Want it all back」「Piano solo」ほかを収録。

内容（「Oricon」データベースより）
劇場用アニメ「カウボーイビバップ 天国の扉」で使用された、菅野よう子率いる多国籍バンド“シートベルツ”の楽曲を収めたミュージッククリップ集など。 

=====================================================================
Differing from Future Blues, the Future Blues DVD features several live recordings, two of them being unique to the DVD.

Ultra-Rare DVD of the short film and live concert "Future Blues" by Katsu Nagaishi with music by Yoko Kanno and The Seatbelts.First part of the DVD contains the live action film "Future Blues" with the same music as used in the Cowboy Bebop Knockin' On Heaven's Door anime movie. The second part contains a live concert for Yoko Kanno and the Seatbelts performing the tracks from Future Blues/Cowboy Bebop movies.

The short film follows the journey of the iconic cowboy/guitarist/boxer from the Cowboy Bebop Knockin' On Heaven's Door CD (and as seen on the back of the DVD).

DVD-9, 73 mins long, all-region, and in Japanese only.
1. Tank!
2. Bad Dog, No Biscuit
3. Want It All Back (live recording unique to this album)
4. Blue (live recording unique to this album)
5. Piano solo
